data.name: Hell Punk Awakening
data.detailed_description:
• Deep combat systems that leads to new insane encounters every time. Use your body and surroundings to destroy enemies in the most ludicrous fashion possible.
  • Unique roguevania-style progression makes the game highly replayable while you still progress beyond death.
  • Explore several environments and overthrow the capital fortress of hell.
  • Take part of the events before Hell Punk Horror and induce a cosmic revolution by disrupting the very fabric of hell.

Hell Punk Awakening is both a complete standalone experience, and a taste of what you'll see in Hell Punk Horror.
data.about_the_game:
• Deep combat systems that leads to new insane encounters every time. Use your body and surroundings to destroy enemies in the most ludicrous fashion possible.
  • Unique roguevania-style progression makes the game highly replayable while you still progress beyond death.
  • Explore several environments and overthrow the capital fortress of hell.
  • Take part of the events before Hell Punk Horror and induce a cosmic revolution by disrupting the very fabric of hell.

Hell Punk Awakening is both a complete standalone experience, and a taste of what you'll see in Hell Punk Horror.
data.short_description: Hell Punk Awakening is an unconventional first person brawler where you progress beyond death. Destroy enemies in the most ludicrous fashion possible, and awaken the cosmic gods by wreaking pure chaos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor - 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Includes stylized depictions of severe violence
